item.title: Tania add a quote by Jan Karon
item.description: "One of the things that makes a dead leaf fall to the ground is the bud of the new leaf that pushes it off the limb." -- Jan Karon

item.title: Tania add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Tania add a quote by Salman Rushdie
item.description: "Language is courage: the ability to conceive a thought, to speak it, and by doing so to make it true." -- Salman Rushdie

item.title: Tania add a quote by Chaim Potok
item.description: "I've begun to realize that you can listen to silence and learn from it. It has a quality and a dimension all its own." -- Chaim Potok

item.title: Tania add a quote by Ta'afuli Andrew Fiu
item.description: "Is there anywhere else to sleep tonight... Anywhere?' I pleaded. There's Mei's office, but you'll have to sleep on the floor I'm afraid.' Mei was one of the Ward 9D dietitians. 'I'll sleep on the floor any day. I'm used to it back in the Islands,' I laughed tiredly. I settled down on the floor. The three rugs I had brought to cushion my back worked surprisingly well. It was almost more comfortable than the thin mats on the cold concrete floors of the fales in Samoa. The idea of sleeping in someone's office was the best idea I had had all year. I decided that I would keep this secret to myself." -- Ta'afuli Andrew Fiu

item.title: Tania add a quote by Eric Nuzum
item.description: "If there is one thing I'd learned about hospitals, it's that they aren't interested in healing you. They are interested in stabilizing you, and then everyone is supposed to move on. They go to stabilize some more people, and you go off to do whatever you do. Healing, if it happens at all, is done on your own, long after the hospital has submitted your final insurance paperwork." -- Eric Nuzum

item.title: Tania add a quote by Erich Maria Remarque
item.description: "A man cannot realize that above such shattered bodies there are still human faces in which life goes its daily round. And this is only one hospital, a single station; there are hundreds of thousands in Germany, hundreds of thousands in France, hundreds of thousands in Russia. How senseless is everything that can ever be written, done, or thought, when such things are possible. It must be all lies and of no account when the culture of a thousand years could not prevent this stream of blood being poured out, these torture chambers in their hundreds of thousands. A hospital alone shows what war is." -- Erich Maria Remarque

item.title: Tania add a quote by Pat Barker
item.description: "We are Craiglockhart's success stories. Look at us. We don't remember, we don't feel, we don't think - at least beyond the confines of what's needed to do the job. By any proper civilized standard (but what does that mean now?) we are objects of horror. But our nerves are completely steady. And we are still alive." -- Pat Barker

item.title: Tania add a quote by Stevie Smith
item.description: "The world is come upon me, I used to keep it a long way off, But now I have been run over and I am in the hands of the hospital staff." -- Stevie Smith

item.title: Tania add a quote by Kaui Hart Hemmings
item.description: "The sun is shining, mynah birds are chattering, palm trees are swaying, so what. I'm in the hospital and I'm healthy. My heart is beating as it should. My brain is firing off messages that are loud and clear. My wife is on the upright hospital bed, positioned the way people sleep on airplanes, her body stiff, head cocked to the side. Her hands on her lap." -- Kaui Hart Hemmings

item.title: Tania add a quote by Gloria Naylor
item.description: "The music in his laughter had a way of rounding off the missing notes in her soul." -- Gloria Naylor

item.title: Tania add a quote by rebecca bloomwood
item.description: "When I shop the world gets better, the world is better; and then it's not anymore and I have to do it again." -- rebecca bloomwood

item.title: Tania add a quote by Muhammad Adb Al-Rahman Al-Arifi
item.description: "Instead of cursing the darkness, try to fix the lamp." -- Muhammad Adb Al-Rahman Al-Arifi

item.title: Tania add a quote by Simon winchester
item.description: "The very name Impressionism is taken from an Atlantic Ocean painting - that of Monet, of sunrise in the harbor of Le Havre, done in 1872." -- Simon winchester

item.title: Tania add a quote by Paul Guildea
item.description: "Hope is the universal currency of a recession. Invest it wisely!" -- Paul Guildea

item.title: Tania add a quote by Jane Addams
item.description: "The good we secure for ourselves is precarious and uncertain until it is secured for all of us and incorporated into our common life." -- Jane Addams
